name: SHAPE.SHIFT
description:
Rhythm-based side-scrolling obstacle-dodger made for Ludum Dare 35 (Theme: Shapeshift).

Music by Kevin MacLeod ("Harmful or Fatal")

Post-jam version contains:

  • Bugfixes
  • Tightened controls
  • Tweaked level layouts
  • Tuned difficulty (it's not as impossible now)
  • Changed color of some objects for clarity

Click here to go to the Ludum Dare entry.
